Jargon Term: Even though the infection was most likely viral, we ask that you complete antibiotics as prescribed and not miss [**First Name (Titles) 691**] [**Last Name (Titles) 4319**].
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Please discuss this with your primary doctor at your next visit.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - PCP appointment

Jargon Term: You are taking a blood thinner (coumadin) for your heart condition called atrial fibrillation. Your blood was too thin and we stopped your coumadin briefly. Then we restarted it as the thinning decreased.
It is very important that you follow up with coumadin clinic to check your INR (blood thinning) carefully, otherwise you run serious health risks, such as stroke, or bleeding.
We stopped your flexuril because it is contraindicated in your condition.
